澐字的基本解释

澐
yún
见“沄”①。

澐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
(1)江中的大波涛。
(2)水流貌。参见“澐澐”。

澐字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澐； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页652第06
【唐韻】【集韻】?王分切，音雲。【說文】江水大波謂之澐。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
(1) The big waves in the river.
(2) Water flow appearance. See "Pun Peng".

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沄; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 652 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wang divided and cut, sound cloud. [Said the text] The big wave of river water is called 沄.
